com.communote.server.api.core.application

Interface Runtime

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultRuntime

    public interface Runtime
    Communote runtime environment.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCustomInitializer(CustomInitializer customInitializer)
      Add an initializer to do custom initializations during startup.
      void addInitializationCompleteListener(InitializationCompleteListener listener)
      Add a listener that is informed after the application was completely initialized.
      void addInitializationCondition(String conditionId)
      Add a condition which needs to be fulfilled before the application is considered as completely initialized.
      void fulfillInitializationCondition(String conditionId)
      Mark a condition that was previously added with addInitializationCondition(String) as fulfilled.
      ApplicationInformation getApplicationInformation() 
      ConfigurationManager getConfigurationManager() 
      InitializationStatus getInitializationStatus() 
      CommunoteInstaller getInstaller()

      boolean isInitialized() 
      void start()
      Starts the bootstrapping.
      void stop()
      Stop the runtime and free any resources held.

    • Method Detail

      • addCustomInitializer

        void addCustomInitializer(CustomInitializer customInitializer)
        Add an initializer to do custom initializations during startup. The added initializer will be called after the core components were initialized. Initializers which are added after the application was initialized are ignored.
        Parameters:
        customInitializer - the additional initializer

      • addInitializationCompleteListener

        void addInitializationCompleteListener(InitializationCompleteListener listener)
        Add a listener that is informed after the application was completely initialized.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to add

      • addInitializationCondition

        void addInitializationCondition(String conditionId)
        Add a condition which needs to be fulfilled before the application is considered as completely initialized. Adding a condition after the application was initialized has no effect.
        Parameters:
        conditionId - the ID of the condition

      • fulfillInitializationCondition

        void fulfillInitializationCondition(String conditionId)
        Mark a condition that was previously added with addInitializationCondition(String) as fulfilled. If this was the last unfulfilled init condition and the core is already initialized the application will be considered as completely initialized and the initialization complete listeners will be called. If the provided condition was not added the call is ignored.
        Parameters:
        conditionId - the ID of the condition to fulfill.

      • getApplicationInformation

        ApplicationInformation getApplicationInformation()
        Returns:
        information about the running Communote

      • getConfigurationManager

        ConfigurationManager getConfigurationManager()
        Returns:
        manager for accessing and modifying configuration

      • getInitializationStatus

        InitializationStatus getInitializationStatus()
        Returns:
        the current status of the initialization

      • getInstaller

        CommunoteInstaller getInstaller()
        Returns:
        the installer to install Communote or null if Communote is already installed.

      • isCoreInitialized

        boolean isCoreInitialized()
        Returns:
        whether the core application is initialized. This will be true if Communote is installed and the core application with all components is initialized. Some init conditions might not be fulfilled yet.

      • isInitialized

        boolean isInitialized()
        Returns:
        whether the application is completely initialized. This will be true if isCoreInitialized() returns true and all conditions are fulfilled.

      • start

        void start()
        Starts the bootstrapping. If the bootstrapping fails a BootstrapException will be thrown.

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stop the runtime and free any resources held.
